lines.text: The story you are about to see is a fib, but it's short. The names are made up, but the problems are real.

[closing line of Morris Norris's mugshot sequence]
He spent the next 20 years in rock 'n roll... he piles rocks and he eats rolls.

[closing line of I. M. Peeved's mugshot sequence]
He went to prison, where he learned to like math, teaches it to others, and has become an advisor to a show called Square One TV.
